response.original_title: Come Aboard : Queen Mary 2 To Rio
response.overview: Join 2,600 Rio-bound passengers aboard the Queen Mary 2! Eighty five minutes will just cruise by as you experience 24 unforgettable days aboard the largest, most luxurious ocean liner of its kind! From Ft. Lauderdale to Brazil, immerse yourself in leisurely days and elegant nights, dine with the Commodore, and gaze at stunning views from the deck. You will visit signature sites in St. Thomas and Salvador, stroll along the fashionable Copacabana and Ipanema beaches, and take part in RioÂ’s wild Carnival celebration. The Queen Mary 2 to Rio recaptures the golden age of the great steam ships, and vividly captures this one-of-a-kind cruise experience.
response.title: Come Aboard : Queen Mary 2 To Rio
